entry.title: Is the "SAP Certified Associate - SAP Generative AI Developer" certification a solid entry point?
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I saw that SAP recently released the SAP Certified Associate - SAP Generative AI Developer certification. I’m currently exploring how to get started with AI from a technical perspective, and this certification caught my attention. I’m curious to know if it could be a practical and valuable entry point.

Here’s what I’m looking for:

  • Feedback from anyone who has taken or started preparing for this certification.
  • Whether the developer tools, frameworks, and APIs related to SAP’s Generative AI are production-ready or still evolving.
  • Your thoughts on whether this certification will hold value from a technical and practical perspective over the next few years.

I’m absolutely fine if the offering is still maturing, I just want to avoid diving in too early if it’s not yet relevant for developers.

Looking forward to hearing your thoughts and experiences!

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: SAP certificate not received after passing the certification
entry.content:
I have recently given my SAP exam on SAP Certified Associate - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition, Management Accounting Exam on 10.08.2025 with SAP certification ID: C_TS4CO_2023. But I have not received any mail of digital badge download.

I have already passed the exam with 78% but I am yet to receive the certificate. I have also raised a ticket 5000199873 but there is no response yet from the support team.

I am little bit worried now because this is the 2nd certificate which I have given exam now, for the first certificate I have received it within few minutes after completing.

Can anyone from SAP community please help me what should I do know. Any contacts will help me as well.

Thanks & Regards,
Koustav

entry.title: Is SAP Certified Associate - SAP HCM for SAP ECC or SAP S/4HANA (C_P2W12_2311) retired or not?
entry.content:
When checking out the available certifications on the website, you can not longer find it.

Nonetheless, in the exam dashboard you can still schedule an exam for C_P2W12_2311?

entry.title: Looking for Updated SAP C_THR88_2505 Practice Questions 2025?

Thanks a lot for your help!

entry.title: Credit card Option is also Not available
entry.content:
Dear SAP Training Support Team,

I hope you are doing well.

I am trying to purchase an SAP Certification attempt through the SAP Certification Hub. In my account, I can only see Invoice and Preferred Card as options, but no active debit or credit card payment method is available.

Could you kindly advise which payment methods are supported for my country(India) and guide me on the best way to proceed with the payment?

I would greatly appreciate your assistance.

Warm regards,

Mohamad Inayath

entry.title: OpenText training and certification for SAP resellers
entry.content:
Boost Your Services. Build Customer Trust. Get Certified.

Over half of SAP license and cloud sales involve a trusted partner. With sales growth of more than 27% projected in the coming year, there’s never been a better time to strengthen your offering for 2025/2026.

SAP and OpenText are excited to launch the updated training and certification program for SAP SuccessFactors Document Management Core by OpenText (also known as OpenText Core Content Management for SAP SuccessFactors ).

Why this matters for you and your customers
If your customers use SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central but lack a fully integrated HR document management solution, you have a perfect opportunity to deliver sustainable, transformational change. With the SaaS solution SAP SuccessFactors Document Management Core, you can help your customers:

  • Streamline onboarding and HR processes with automation and workflows.

Provide secure, role-based access to employee files from within SAP SuccessFactors HCM

  • Meet data privacy requirements while ensuring complete employee files with records management
  • Improve HR communications with accurate and personalized employee documents

As SAP’s largest Solution Extension partner, OpenText offers a product that is SAP-tested, validated, and approved—giving your customers confidence in your services. Trained partners can deliver an integrated HR document management platform within weeks, providing your customers with a more compliant solution across the entire hire-to-retire cycle.

Why certification is essential
SAP will only provide full support for configurations implemented by certified partners. Without the badge, you risk delays and limitations in being able to provide the support your customers expect.

When you complete the course and pass the exam, you’ll be equipped to deliver exceptional customer experiences when implementing SAP SuccessFactors Document Management Core. Certification will showcase to customers you’re ready.

You can also grow your revenue with expanded services such as advanced document workflows, intelligent capture, AI and API integrations. Explore Standard or Premium individual learning subscriptions.

Get certified today

 Partner certification exam.

  • This is a scheduled 2-hour exam
  • Number for questions:  60
  • Questions format: The test includes question formats such as multiple choice and true/false.
  • Passing Score:  70%
  • Language: English
  • Investment: $500 USD (or your country's currency equivalent, excluding VAT or other taxes)
  • See also Additional Details, including certification validity & renewal and retakes policy information.

Prepare for the certification exam with solution training

If you want to enhance your customer service abilities and get closer to a 100% pass rate, we highly recommend that you enrol in a small group training program.

What you can expect

  • Two days of instructor-led training for SAP resellers (OpenText reseller status is not necessary). 
  • Available in English and German.
  • Investment: $2,400.00 USD (or local currency equivalent, excluding VAT and taxes).

What you’ll gain from the training

  • Live, interactive sessions led by expert trainers
  • Guidance on configuration, integration, and personalization.
  • Tools to deliver targeted, automated communications.
  • Preparation for the certification exam.
  • Promotion of your services through SAP and OpenText reseller channels.

Discover additional learning subscription options to continue your growth journey.

Ready to take the next step?
Register now for the upcoming virtual training session for SAP SuccessFactors Document Management Core by OpenText. For more details, contact training@opentext.com.

Let’s work together to make every SAP SuccessFactors HCM project a success.

SAP SuccessFactors Document Management Core by Open Text , HCM Employee Self-Service , Partnership ,

entry.title: Certifications not visible on " my certifications " on learning.sap
entry.content:
My valid certifications are not visible under " my certifications" on learning.sap. I checked some similar existing queries and also raised a query with support. They have verified that my universal id is correctly set up and also the email attached to my profile is correct and they are able to see that I have certifications. 

But they also said that "my certifications" tab is experiencing some technical issue so it is not visible on my end. And then they closed the ticket. Can someone please let me know if they are also facing similar issues. It has been quite a few days I am not able to see the certifications and also I don't understand, if I cant access it how can I renew it?

Appreciate any feedback and response

Thanks

entry.title: C_WZADM_2404 Exam (SAP Build Work Zone) - Guidance for Preparing SAP Certified Associate
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I’m planning to take the SAP Certified Associate – SAP Build Work Zone Implementation and Administration (C_WZADM_2404) exam. I’ve reviewed the Learning Journey and the exam topics like Solution Architecture, Extensibility, Integration, and Overview, but I’m still unsure how to structure my preparation effectively.

For those who have already taken this certification:

Which areas did you find the most challenging?

Are the official Learning Journey and practice materials enough, or should I look into additional resources?

Any tips on managing time during the 60 questions / 2-hour exam?

Appreciate any insights or personal experiences you can share.

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Certification - Sourcing and Procurement - Differences between C_TS452 & C_S4CPR
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

does anyone know if the content of these two certifications — and their corresponding exams — differ significantly from each other?

C_TS452 - SAP Certified Associate - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition, Sourcing and Procurement

C_S4CPR - SAP Certified Associate - Implementation Consultant - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, Sourcing and Procurement

Thanks a lot for your insights!

Anna

entry.title: Learning Hub - another Language
entry.content:
Hi everyone, I just started the Learning Journey SAP S/4HANA Finance - Financial Accounting.
I haven't booked the Learning Hub for €1,260.00 yet.
All learning materials are available free of charge, but only in English. Since I want to get my certificate in German and Google Translate doesn't translate the videos and screenshots, I have the following question:


Is only the English content free, and do I need the Learning Hub for the German version?


What I want to avoid is purchasing the Learning Hub and then not seeing any additional content beyond what I can already see now.
Specifically, I'm referring to courses F1120 / F1130 / F1140, as well as S4F12 / S4F13...
Thanks!

entry.title: Certificate / Digital Badge Not Received
entry.content:
I recently passed my SAP certification exam, C_BCSBS_2502 (Positioning SAP Business Suite), on 16 October 2025 with 70%, but I have not yet received my certificate or digital badge.

I have already submitted a ticket (5000233204), but there has been no response from the support team so far.

I am a bit worried because my friend, who passed on the same day as me, received their certificate within a few minutes after completing the exam.

Could anyone from the SAP community please advise what I should do now? Any contacts or guidance would be greatly appreciated.

Best regards,

Sirada Thanee

Anthony

entry.title: How to Prepare Effectively for SAP C_BCBDC_2505 Exam?
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I’m currently preparing for the SAP Certified Associate – Build Apps and Automate Processes (C_BCBDC_2505) exam and wanted to ask the community for some guidance.

I’ve been exploring SAP Build Apps and Process Automation inside SAP BTP, but I’m still a bit unsure about which topics need deeper focus — especially around workflow configuration, integration with SAP S/4HANA, and automation triggers.

Has anyone here recently taken this certification?

What areas should I pay extra attention to?

Are there any official or community-recommended practice resources you found useful?

How much hands-on experience is really needed to pass?

I’ve started practicing with MyCertsHub’s C_BCBDC_2505 question sets, which seem quite realistic, but I’d love to hear from others about their preparation experience or any tips that helped you succeed.

Thanks in advance for your insights! 🙌
